title: Old Aatrox was hot garbage....
body:
Propped up with broken runes and revamped Tri, and he still sucked. He failed at his own gimmick, which was being a life steal tank.

New 'Trox hits hard, goes hard, and is way more impactful on games.

Plus, he poops on Teemo's couch and there's nothing he can do about it. Best champ.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Lunaranul,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vUz6dILT,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-01-02T20:55:07.440+0000)
>
> STOP FUCKING DOWNVOTING ME.
> 
> YOU KNOW WHAT, FINE, FUCK HAVING MY OWN OPINIONS. IF THEY'RE ALWAYS GONNA BE FUCKING WRONG AND GET ME HATED, THEN FUCK IT. I'M SICK OF PEOPLE FUCKING HATING ME.
> 
> FINE, FUCK YOU RIOT. THROW NEW AATROX IN THE FUCKING GARBAGE AND REVERT HIM. REVERT. REVERT. REVERT.
> 
> REVERT. ...

breh

I upvoted it.

The people who mained Aatrox for the month before his revert and think his old kit was great are silly.

http://i.imgur.com/3IAnek2.jpg[]

> 
> I upvoted it.
> 
> The people who mained Aatrox for the month before his revert and think his old kit was great are silly.
> 
> http://i.imgur.com/3IAnek2.jpg[]

Being ridiculously angry at little things is what I do.

It keeps my blood flowing.

> [{quoted}](name=Lunaranul,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vUz6dILT,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2019-01-02T21:00:42.073+0000)
>
> Being ridiculously angry at little things is what I do.
> 
> It keeps my blood flowing.

Pff, everyone downvotes me for my opinions on reworks. You'll get used to it.

Edit: I mean, just look at my first comment on this thread.

Mained him years before his rework, during season 5 and 6, 60% winrate. he wasn't perfect but was viable in the right hands.
eat that.

I like how some people think Aatrox's old W had skill expression.

As if "press W when low on Health to change from damage per 3rd hit to healing per 3rd hit" takes skill and some advanced know-how.

I mained Aatrox in season 5 and 6. had 60% winrate.
he wasn't perfect, but he was fun and viable in the right hands.
This shilling for nu-trox is so obvious it's sad
Just wait until Teemo get his rework.. Will make the poser cry & wish he was never born. :3

Old Aatrox is Aatrox... autoattack drain tank..
New one is garbage... From drain tank to combo champ...

Old Aatrox is the only Aatrox. 
That russian champ is just a wannabe.
